alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 10:51PM EST until February 20 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 24.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM EST Sunday was 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 14.3 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.4 feet on 05/28/2004. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued by 9 am EST Monday.
